dedicated-vm-host
*****************


Description
===========

A dedicated virtual machine host lets you host multiple VM instances
on a dedicated server that is not shared with other tenancies.


Available Commands
==================

* change-compartment

* create

* create-dedicated-vm-host-compute-bare-metal-host-placement-
  constraint-details

* create-dedicated-vm-host-host-group-placement-constraint-details

* delete

* get

* host-shape

  * list

* instance-shape

  * list

* list

* update
